title: Wonderful 1248 sq ft 2 bed / 2 bath designed with urban elegance
posting_body: ['Come home to a great community - IMT Lakeshore Lofts!', 'Address:', '800 Lake Carolyn Parkway', 'Irving, TX 75039', 'Beds:', '2  /', 'Baths:', '2 /', 'Size:', '1248 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$2360', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'Welcome to IMT Lakeshore Lofts - a premier Dallas apartment community that is the perfect mix of metropolitan and tranquility and offers the lifestyle you deserve.', 'Enjoy luxury apartment home living in the ideal Las Colinas neighborhood.', 'IMT Lakeshore Lofts is ideal for residents who have an active lifestyle.', 'Situated on Lake Carolyn with direct access to the Waterfront Promenade, a short walk to the DART Light Rail Station and Campion trail access to 22 miles of hiking and biking trails, it will be easy to call IMT Lakeshore Lofts home.', 'Come home to modern features and an abundance of community amenities that range from two Fitness Centers to a Media Center.', 'Our interior standard upgrades such as stained concrete flooring and trendy exposed duct work, radiates luxury.', 'Escape to IMT Lakeshore Lofts where peaceful and luxury living awaits.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our
